# HUD::OPEN_SOCIAL_CLUB_MENU

## Summary
If the player is currently in a pause menu, then this will open up the social club menu

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Uses the `SOCIAL_CLUB2` scaleform.
